title: I CANT CONNECT TO MY GAME HELP ME.
body: So whenever I start a game it says unable to connect to the server and its really ticking me off. I respect riot and want to solve this. If you can help or give a suggestion I would appreciate it.

replies.body: There currently aren't any issues that should be preventing you from accessing the game, including the reconnect screen.  Your specific issue sounds like a connection problem reaching the game server.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Tried all the troubleshoot options still not working. But for some reason my PBE runs fine.

I just had this same problem and it resulted in a leaver buster :(
It wouldn't even allow me to reconnect via the client.

There's currently a bug preventing players from auto-connecting to games. You should receive an error message when this happens; simply click "Cancel" then "Reconnect" and you should be in-game!!

Let me know if you have any further questions.
